DOC.brief_summary: To investigate impact consumption dairy yogurt rhamnogalacturonan ( RG ) Korean citrus Hallabong peel polysaccharide Natural Killer ( NK ) cell activity circulate cytokine level .
DOC.brief_title: Consumption Dairy Yogurt Enhanced Immune Function
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled study conduct 120 nondiabetic nonobese subject . Over 8 week period , test group consume one pack ( 150ml ) dairy yogurt 50mg probiotic 100mg Korean citrus Hallabong peel polysaccharide ( 60 % RG , 20 % mono- di-saccharide , 5 % polyphenol ) day , whereas placebo group consume product without Korean citrus Hallabong peel polysaccharide . NK cell activity ( % ) measure base ratio effector cell ( E ) ( peripheral blood mononuclear cell , PBMC ) participant Target cell ( T ) ( K562 cell ) 10:1 , 5:1 , 2.5:1 1.25:1 .
DOC.criteria: The level white blood cell 8x10^3/Î¼L male female 3069 year old nondiabetic nonobese subject able give inform consent consumption probiotic product within 1 month screen unstable body weight ( bodyweight change > 2 kg within 3 month screen ) diabetes history/presence significant metabolic disease pregnancy breastfeed acute chronic infection liver disease , kidney disease , gastrointestinal disease , acute chronic disease require treatment subject take drug supplement
